divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). I WAS NORTH BOUND ON ESC. BLVD.DRIVING HOME.I NOTICED A BRIGHT GLOWINGRED CRAFT COMING SOUTH POINTS NORTH.I FIRST THOUGHT IT WAS AN EMERGENCY MEDICALHELICOPTER HEADED FOR PALOMAR HOSPITAL.BUT IT DID NOT TURN EAST.IT WAS ALMOSTDIRECTLY ABOVE US THEN HEADED WEST.THEN I SAW AN ILLUMINATION THAT HAD A VRTICALDOWNWARD FLIGHT.2-3SECONDS PAST THEN IT OCCUREDAGAIN.IT HELD ITS ALTITUDE IN AWESTERLY DIRECTION.STARTED FADING THEN FLARED UP,DIMMED,FLARED,THENFADED FROMSIGHT.
